name: Sweep: AI
description:
Controls:

Left Mouse Button: Pop a red ball when the cursor is pointed at it.

NOTE: Press Enter after you type your nickname for the leaderboard.

Goal:

Compete for the LOWEST score possible. Mr. Cube gains points from balls pushed off the edge while he loses points from balls falling on his head. Pop the red balls to prevent him from dodging the falling balls. The lower your score is, the higher your rank on the leaderboard. 

Description:

The protagonist "Mr. Cube" tries to avoid the balls falling on his head. You, as the player, are supposed to help him. However, you do not. Pop the balls after they touch the ground to push Mr. Cube and disable him for a second, which leaves him vulnerable to the balls falling on his head. As a result to your evil plan, Mr. Cube quickly sweeps the floor pushing the balls off the edge to prevent you from annoying him.
